summary: Website with navigation, sections (Home, Services, About, Contact), and neon-enhanced eagle logo
architectural_notes: Section IDs: home, services, about, contact
Navigation uses smooth scroll to section anchors
Eagle logo uses CSS animations with GPU acceleration
Neon glow: electric blue with pulse animation (3-4s cycle)
Logo hover: 1.05x scale + increased glow intensity

existing_features.title: Fix navigation menu section linking by connecting the About button to #about section ID and Contact button to #contact section ID with smooth scrolling enabled
Verify and ensure all sections have correct unique IDs: Home section (id="home"), Services section (id="services"), About section (id="about"), Contact section (id="contact")
Update Navbar component links to use correct hash anchors: Home → #home, Services → #services, About → #about, Contact → #contact
Remove the Projects button completely from desktop navigation, mobile menu, and any routing or navigation configuration in the Navbar component
Add electric blue neon glow effect to the eagle logo with soft outer glow and inner light emission that gently pulses continuously
Add smooth light shimmer animation moving across the eagle logo with subtle energy pulse every 3-4 seconds, creating a futuristic AI/automation themed effect
Add hover interaction to eagle logo that increases glow intensity, adds smooth 1.05x scale-up effect, and spreads glow softly outward like energy activation
Optimize eagle logo neon glow animations using CSS animations or GPU-accelerated effects to ensure smooth performance on mobile devices without lag
Implement eagle logo entry animation on page load with smooth fade and scale from 0.85 to normal size, with soft upward motion
Add neon glow activation effect on eagle logo entry where glow starts dim and gradually powers on within 1-1.5 seconds with energy spreading from center to edges
Enable continuous soft glow pulse on eagle logo after entry animation completes, pulsing slowly every 3-4 seconds with premium feel
Preserve the existing eagle logo shape and only enhance lighting, glow effects, and animation quality without changing the core design

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix header navigation menu links and smooth scrolling
Add futuristic neon glow effect to eagle logo
Enhance eagle logo entry animation with neon activation

projectName: Fix navigation menu, remove Projects button, and enhance eagle logo with neon glow animations
